name: CUSTOM Collection #10
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign collections = section.settings.collections
        
  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile
  
  assign layout_type = section.settings.layout_type
  assign layout_type_mobile = section.settings.layout_type_mobile
  assign products_view = section.settings.products_view
  assign products_view_mobile = section.settings.products_view_mobile
  assign products_gap = section.settings.products_gap
  assign products_gap_mobile = section.settings.products_gap_mobile 
  assign products_mt = section.settings.products_mt
  assign products_mt_mobile = section.settings.products_mt_mobile 

  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color
  
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_width = section.settings.image_width
  assign image_width_mobile = section.settings.image_width_mobile
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
          
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_hover_color = section.settings.title_hover_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile
  assign title_align = section.settings.title_align
  assign title_align_mobile = section.settings.title_align_mobile

  assign navigation_mt = section.settings.navigation_mt
  assign navigation_mt_mobile = section.settings.navigation_mt_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign scrollbar_height = section.settings.scrollbar_height
  assign scrollbar_show_desktop = section.settings.scrollbar_show_desktop
  assign scrollbar_show_mobile = section.settings.scrollbar_show_mobile
  assign scrollbar_drag_bg_color = section.settings.scrollbar_drag_bg_color
  assign scrollbar_bg_color = section.settings.scrollbar_bg_color
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .collection-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .collection-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ products_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}  {
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat({{ products_view_mobile | round: 0 }}, 1fr);
    gap: {{ products_gap_mobile }}px;
    margin-top: {{ products_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    height: auto !important;
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }} !important;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    text-decoration: none !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
  }

  .collection-card-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    gap: 10px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    overflow: hidden !important;
  }

  .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box; 
  }
  
  .collection-card-{{ section.id }} .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    max-width: {{ image_width_mobile }}px;
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #afafaf;
  }

  .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: {{ title_align_mobile }};    
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;    
  }

  .collection-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ navigation_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 20px;
  }

  .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-left: auto;
  } 


  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    position: static !important;
    height: {{ scrollbar_height }}px !important;
    background-color: {{ scrollbar_bg_color }} !important;
    z-index: 2 !important;
  }

  .collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} .swiper-scrollbar-drag {
    display: block !important;
    background-color: {{ scrollbar_drag_bg_color }}!important;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .collection-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }
  
    .collection-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ products_mt }}px;
    }

    .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}  {
      margin-left: 0rem !important;
      margin-right: 0rem !important;
      padding-left: 0rem !important;
      padding-right: 0rem !important;
    }
    

    .collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: repeat({{ products_view | round: 0 }}, 1fr);
      gap: {{ products_gap }}px;
      margin-top: {{ products_mt }}px;
    }  
    
    .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }    
    
    .collection-card-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }    
  
    .collection-card-{{ section.id }} .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ image_width }}px;
    }

    .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ title_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .collection-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-title-{{ section.id }},
    .collection-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-title-{{ section.id }}{
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      color: {{ title_hover_color }};
    }

    .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;    
    }

    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .collection-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }
  }

  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img {
    transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out;
  }
  
  {% if section.settings.image_hover_effect %}
    .collection-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img,
    .collection-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .collection-image-{{ section.id }} img {
      transform: scale(1.05);
    }
  {% endif %}
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .collection-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .collection-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if layout_type_mobile == 'grid' %}
  <style>
    .collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
    .collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid;
    }
  </style> 
{% else %}   
  <style>
    .collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }
    .collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style> 
{% endif %}

{% if layout_type == 'grid' %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
      .collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {
        display: grid;
      }
    }
  </style> 
{% else %}   
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block;
      }
      .collection-grid-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style> 
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/8;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if scrollbar_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }

    .collection-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: space-between;
    }
    
    .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .collection-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: center;
    }
    
    .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: 0;
    } 
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if scrollbar_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }

      .collection-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
        justify-content: space-between;
      }
      
      .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }

      .collection-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
        justify-content: center;
      }
      
      .collection-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collection-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ products_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collection-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ products_gap }}px;
    } 

    .collection-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .collection-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ products_view }} - ({{ products_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} collection-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="collection-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          {{ heading }}
        </div>  
      {% endif %}
      <div class="collection-slider-wrap-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="collection-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% if collections != blank %}
              {% for collection in collections %}
                <a href="{{ collection.url }}" class="collection-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">                           
                  <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if collection.featured_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ collection.featured_image | image_url: width: 300 }}" alt="{{ collection.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <h3 class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ collection.title }}</h3>                            
                </a>
              {% endfor %}
            {% elsif section.blocks.size > 0 %}
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                <a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" class="collection-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">                           
                  <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% elsif block.settings.collection.featured_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.collection.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <h3 class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      {{ block.settings.title }}
                    {% else %}
                      {{ block.settings.collection.title }}
                    {% endif %}
                  </h3>                            
                </a>
              {% endfor %}
            {% else %}
              {% for item in (1..6) %}
                <div class="collection-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">    
                  <div class="collection-slide-body-{{ section.id }}">
                    <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">                
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}               
                    </div>
                    <h3 class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">Title</h3>  
                  </div>                                          
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            {% endif %}  
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="collection-navigation-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} swiper-scrollbar"></div>
          <div class="collection-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
            <button class="collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>   
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="collection-grid-{{ section.id }}">
        {% if collections != blank %}
          {% for collection in collections %}
            <a href="{{ collection.url }}" class="collection-card-{{ section.id }}">                           
              <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if collection.featured_image != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ collection.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ collection.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              <h3 class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ collection.title }}</h3>                            
            </a>
          {% endfor %}
        {% elsif section.blocks.size > 0 %}
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <a href="{{ block.settings.collection.url }}" class="collection-card-{{ section.id }}">                           
              <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                {% elsif block.settings.collection.featured_image != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ block.settings.collection.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.collection.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %}
              </div>
              <h3 class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                  {{ block.settings.title }}
                {% else %}
                  {{ block.settings.collection.title }}
                {% endif %}
              </h3>                            
            </a>
          {% endfor %}
        {% else %}
          {% for item in (1..6) %}
            <div class="collection-card-{{ section.id }}">                    
              <div class="collection-image-{{ section.id }}">               
                {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}               
              </div>
              <h3 class="collection-title-{{ section.id }}">Title</h3>                
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
        {% endif %}       
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initCollection10() {
    document.querySelector('.collection-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper(".collection-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.collection-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.collection-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      scrollbar: {
        el: '.collection-scrollbar-{{ section.id }}',
        draggable: true,
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ products_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ products_view_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ products_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ products_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }},
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ products_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ products_view }},
        }
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initCollection10);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initCollection10);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initCollection10);
  }
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
